articles.title: Encyclopedic Political Program for Strengthening Party and Building Socialist Power
articles.content:
Encyclopedic Political Program for Strengthening Party and Building Socialist Power
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- A wave of jubilation and emotion sweeps the whole country after the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un made the report on the review of the work of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) at the 7th WPK Congress.
					 Kim Kon Chol, a department director of the Ministry of Railways, told KCNA:
					
					 The historic report made by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un clearly indicates the way for the far-reaching plan of the Korean revolution.
					
					 His report is an encyclopedic political program that gives perfect answers to all issues arising in strengthening the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Party and building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Upon receiving the revolutionary guideline of the WPK which makes another milestone for final victory, we, officials and railway workers, are convinced that the causes of national prosperity and reunification will be attained in the near future, thanks to the WPK's grandiose plan and its gifted strategic and tactical leadership. 
					
					 Hong Song Hyon, head of a department of Kim Chaek University of Technology, said:
					
					 The historic report made by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un serves as a militant banner inspiring all servicepersons and people of the DPRK to the general offensive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 Signal achievements have been made in developing latest science and putting the national economy on a Juche, modern and scientific basis by the large contingents of talents brought up under the loving care of the Party. 
					
					 Thanks to the WPK's consistent adherence to the principle of giving priority to science and technology, the DPRK could rank itself among space powers, bionics powers and software powers.
					
					 We will bring about the revolutionary turn in education and scientific research, true to the noble intention of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un and thus make contributions to making all the people well versed in science and technology and developing the country into a science and technology power and a talented nation.
					
					 Pak Sin Il, a worker of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, said the historic report made by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un inspires the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class with firm confidence in the final victory of the Korean revolution.
					
					 I will do my best to contribute to stepping up the building of a thriving nation by conducting a vigorous struggle for increased electricity output, he noted.

articles.title: Loving Care for People's Happy Life
articles.content:
Loving Care for People's Happy Life
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Ryomyong Street to be conducive to the happiness and wellbeing of people is now under construction in Pyongyang, the DPRK, thanks to the loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) for them.
					 It is the supreme principle of all activities of the WPK to steadily improve the standard of people's living.
					
					 At the first Cabinet meeting after the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War, President Kim Il Sung raised the issue of large-scale construction of dwelling houses as one of its agenda items and took measures to furnish a huge amount of state funds to the construction.
					
					 When visiting an apartment in January, Juche 47 (1958), the President stressed the need to install the underfloor heating system of Korean style in all apartments.
					
					 Early in May 1973, he looked round a modern village house and called for building such house for all farmers in the country at an early date.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, Rakwon, Changgwang, Munsu, Kwangbok and Thongil streets took their shapes in Pyongyang in the 1970s, 1980s, and 1990s.
					
					 True to the noble intention of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, supreme leader Kim Jong Un personally initiated the construction of apartment houses for educators and scientists and settled all problems arising in the project.
					
					 His tireless devotion for people is closely associated with the completion of modern apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology, Wisong Scientists Dwelling District, Mirae Scientists Street, dwelling houses in the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm and Rason City, etc.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets IIJI Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets IIJI Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a delegation of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) led by Secretary General Kenichi Ogami which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Sojourn of IIJI Delegation in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Sojourn of IIJI Delegation in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) led by Secretary General Kenichi Ogami visited the Youth Movement Museum.
					 At the main lobby the members of the delegation paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They looked round photos dealing with the exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, historic mementoes and materials, being briefed on the proud course of the Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's youth movement.
					
					 They also toured the Sci-Tech Complex and the Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Visit Liberation Tower, Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Visit Liberation Tower, Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here visited the Liberation Tower on Monday, the 71st anniversary of Russia's victory in the Great Patriotic War.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and other Russian embassy officials and foreign diplomatic envoys and military attaches here.
					
					 A wreath in the name of the Russian embassy was placed before the Liberation Tower. The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army before going round the tower.
					
					 Officials of the Russian embassy also placed a wreath and bouquets before the cemetery of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District, Pyongyang City.
					
					 Earlier, officials of the Russian embassy laid bouquets before the statue of the Soviet Army in Nampho City.
					
					 Meanwhile, staff members of the Russian consulate general in Chongjin laid wreaths before the Liberation Tower and the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in the city.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- A home-visiting group of Koreans in Osaka of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Monday.
					 They laid a bouquet before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Introduced by German Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Introduced by German Body
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The German group for the Study of Korean Culture posted the full texts of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's works "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" and "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" on the website of the MS Travel Company of Germany on May 2 on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The first work, published on March 31, Juche 102 (2013), clarifies justness of the WPK's new strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and the intention of the WPK in setting forth the line.
					
					 The next work is the speech delivered at the military parade held in celebration of the centenary of the birth of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012). It says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proved the immutable truth that dignity and prosperity of the country and nation are guaranteed by the outstanding leader. It also indicates the tasks for glorifying dignity of Songun Korea down through generations and successfully accomplishing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Top Diploma to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian Party
articles.content:
Top Diploma to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian Party
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received the top diploma of the Marxist-Leninist Communist Party of Brazil on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The diploma was conveyed to the DPRK embassy in Brasilia on May 5.
					
					 Aluicio Bevilaqua, general secretary of the party, said that it was the biggest honor to award the top diploma of the party to Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 He said that his party warmly congratulated the Seventh Congress of the WPK, believing that the congress will be a radical turning point in defending national sovereignty of the Korean people, building socialism and accelerating the cause of independence of all the world people against imperialism under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: 7th Congress of WPK Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
7th Congress of WPK Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 They included Korean book, stamp, photo and handicraft exhibitions and lectures in Khabarovsk City of Russia, Shanghai City, Wuxi City of Jiangsu Province, Jining City of Shandong Province, China, Sofia City of Bulgaria and Porbo City of Finland from April 23 to May 8.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and those of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books, stamps and photos introducing the true picture of Juche Korea which is leaping forward day after day.
					
					 The secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and other speakers affirmed that the 7th congress of the WPK would become a crucial historic occasion in promoting wellbeing and prosperity of the Korean people and peace on the Korean peninsula and the development of the Russia-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union said that the 7th Congress of the WPK would instill faith and optimism about victory of socialism into the world progressive people.
					
					 The chairman of the Communists' League of Finland wished the WPK success in its 7th congress, saying that the WPK led by First Secretary Kim Jong Un will achieve only brilliant victory in all fields in the future, too.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the lecture held in Finland.

articles.title: Foreign Newspapers Observe Seventh Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Foreign Newspapers Observe Seventh Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups on April 28 on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Russian newspaper Komsomolskaya Pravda carried an article illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It said that the WPK has covered the path shining with victory and glory for more than 70 years since it was founded.
					
					 Noting that the WPK is fully demonstrating its might all over the world thanks to Kim Jong Un, it expressed conviction that the congress would unroll a bright blueprint for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The British newspaper Lalkar carried an article illustrated with photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It said that the WPK has performed its role as an organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, adding that the congress is a historic event which is of great significance in bringing earlier the final victory of the cause of socialism under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud carried an article illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Un and a photo showing the might of the Korean People's Army. The article said the Korean people are working miracles and innovations stunning the world in the struggle for glorifying the congress as the glorious one of victors.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support Memorandum of KPA Panmunjom Mission
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support Memorandum of KPA Panmunjom Mission
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on May 5 in support of the memorandum of the Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement referred to the memorandum denouncing the U.S. criminal moves for a war and military drills.
					
					 It said:
					
					 We fully support the memorandum of the KPA Panmunjom mission and strongly denounce the U.S. imperialists' criminal racket for a nuclear war.
					
					 The conclusion of a peace treaty and the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea are the only way of ensuring lasting peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Peace treaty instead of the Armistice Agreement!
					
					 Yankees, quit south Korea at once!

articles.title: British Organizations Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Abduction of DPRK's Citizens
articles.content:
British Organizations Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Abduction of DPRK's Citizens
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK released a joint statement on May 2 to condemn the Park Geun Hye regime's thrice-cursed abduction of a group of citizens of the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the allurement and abduction of citizens of the DPRK were a premeditated and organized operation conducted by the south Korean puppet Intelligence Service.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 In the past, too, the puppet regime lured and abducted DPRK's citizens to south Korea and pressurized them into "defection," keeping them away from contact with outside.
					
					 The puppet regime is turning down the just demand of the DPRK, reeling off sheer sophism such as "group defection" and "free will" in a bid to cover up their criminal nature.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are devils, indeed, as they are sending gangsters overseas to lure and abduct DPRK's citizens and divide their harmonious families.
					
					 The UN human rights organizations are duty-bound to thoroughly look into the south Korean authorities' inhuman and unethical crimes, severely punish the assailants and get the grudge of the victims settled.
					
					 The above-said organizations should take relevant measures to help those citizens go back to the DPRK as early as possible and live with their families happily.

articles.title: Guinean Personage Slams U.S. Smear Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
Guinean Personage Slams U.S. Smear Campaign against DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 9 (KCNA) -- Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, on April 30 made public a statement condemning the U.S. for staging an anti-DPRK smear campaign over the test-fire of strategic submarine ballistic missile in the DPRK.
					 The statement accused the U.S. and its followers of spouting absurd sophism that the DPRK's test-fire of SLBM is in violation of the UN Security Council's "resolutions" and destabilizing the regional and international situation.
					
					  It continued:
					
					 The U.S. harassing peace in various parts of the world with huge nuclear weapons is free from sanctions and criticism whereas the DPRK is "under fire" for bolstering up the capabilities for self-defence to protect the sovereignty and dignity of the country from the U.S. aggression. Why?  
					
					 We strongly denounce this unfair behavior of the UNSC pursuant to the U.S. policy.
					
					 The present situation in Afghanistan, Iraq and Libya teaches the lesson that any country weak in military muscle can hardly protect its sovereignty and that of the nation and its people will be subject to all misfortunes.
					
					 We sincerely congratulate the Korean people on the great achievements made in their efforts to bolster up the capability for self-defense.
					
					 We urge the UNSC not to toe the U.S. line any longer but ensure impartiality.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de IIIJ
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de IIIJ
Pyongyang, 9 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 9 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche encabezada por el secretario general Kenichi Ogami, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.
